hero.title: Transform Your Body, Transform Your Life
hero.subtitle: Professional and personalized sports coaching with Jeridi Rahma
hero.credentials: Registered Nurse â€¢ Certified Sports Coach â€¢ 12+ Years of Experience

about.heading: About
about.name: Jeridi Rahma
about.title: Registered Nurse â€¢ Certified Sports Coach
about.bio: 12+ Years of Sports Practice â€¢ Certifications in Fitness, Weightlifting, HIIT & Sports Nutrition
about.whoami_text1: My name is Jeridi Rahma. With over 12 years of sports practice and numerous certifications, I'm passionate about personalized sports coaching. My approach combines professionalism, listening, and effectiveness to help you achieve your goals.
about.whoami_text2: My background as a nurse allows me to understand health and wellness issues, while my certifications in fitness, weightlifting, HIIT, and sports nutrition guarantee comprehensive and consistent follow-up according to your objectives.

services.heading: My Services
services.intro: Three approaches to achieve your goals
services.group_desc: Dynamic and motivating sessions for all levels
services.plateau_desc: Progressive program to recover or improve your training
services.step2_desc: Evaluation of specific needs and habits
services.keypoint1_desc: Current state, goals, level, availability, habits and specific needs
services.keypoint2_desc: Adapted to your goals: weight loss, muscle gain, toning or physical transformation
services.keypoint3_desc: Created specifically according to your profile and goals
services.keypoint4_desc: Online or in-person (if you're in the area)
services.keypoint5_desc: Continuous follow-up and answers to all your questions anytime

pricing.heading: Pricing & Packages
pricing.intro: Choose the package that's right for you
pricing.pkg1_desc: Personalized training program with continuous follow-up
pricing.step1_desc: We discuss your goals, availability and specific needs
pricing.step2_desc: Fully personalized training and nutritional programs
pricing.step4_desc: Concrete results and physical transformation according to your objectives

contact.heading: Contact Me
contact.intro: I'm here to answer all your questions
contact.description: Ready to start your transformation? Don't hesitate to contact me to discuss your goals and find the program that's right for you.
contact.phone_desc: Let's talk directly about your project

footer.tagline: Your personal sports coach for physical and mental transformation.
footer.credentials: Registered Nurse â€¢ Certified Sports Coach â€¢ Available for you 24/7
